title: Wall Street Bets Chinese Stocks Will Extend $2.4 Trillion Rally
description: China has won back global funds in a banner year for stocks, with investors anticipating further gains on the country’s AI prowess and resilience amid US tensions.
content: China has won back global funds in a banner year for stocks, with investors anticipating further gains on the country’s AI prowess and resilience amid US tensions.
